devdoc.author: Abdulbasit Akingbade
devdoc.details: A simple voting contractThe contract owner declares the start date of the election for the current yearThe contract owner adds candidates for the current election yearVoters can only vote during the voting period

addCandidate(string,string,string).details: Only the owner can call this functionCandidates can only be added during an election year

params._logoUrl: the url of the party logo

castVote(uint256).details: Votes can only be casted during the voting periodi.e during an election, after the start date and before the voting period ends

params._tenureInYears: the number of years before the next election takes place

returns._0: the start date of the election for the given year

getTotalCandidatesCount(uint256).details: gets the total number of candidates for the given election year

getTotalVotes(uint256).details: gets the total number of votes casted for the given election year

startElection(uint256).details: Declares the start date of the election for the current yearOnly the owner can call this functionThe election can only be declared during an election year i.e past election year + tenure

devdoc.title: DBallot
